verses.verse: וּבִשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁתַּ֗יִם <S%H8147><s%> And in the second לְמַלְכוּת֙ <S%H4438><s%> of the reign נְבֻֽכַדְנֶצַּ֔ר <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar חָלַ֥ם <S%H2492><s%> dreamed נְבֻֽכַדְנֶצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar חֲלֹמ֑וֹת <S%H2472><s%> dreams וַתִּתְפָּ֣עֶם <S%H6470><s%> was troubled רוּח֔וֹ <S%H7307><s%> wherewith his spirit וּשְׁנָת֖וֹ <S%H8142><s%> and his sleep נִהְיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> brake עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> commanded הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king לִקְרֹ֨א <S%H7121><s%> to call לַֽחַרְטֻמִּ֜ים <S%H2748><s%> the magicians וְלָֽאַשָּׁפִ֗ים <S%H825><s%> and the astrologers וְלַֽמְכַשְּׁפִים֙ <S%H3784><s%> and the sorcerers וְלַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> and the Chaldeans לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> for to shew לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king חֲלֹמֹתָ֑יו <S%H2472><s%> his dreams וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <S%H935><s%> So they came וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king חֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream חָלָ֑מְתִּי <S%H2492><s%> unto them I have dreamed וַתִּפָּ֣עֶם <S%H6470><s%> was troubled רוּחִ֔י <S%H7307><s%> and my spirit לָדַ֖עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲלֽוֹם׃ <S%H2472><s%> the dream

וַֽיְדַבְּר֧וּ <S%H1696><s%> Then spake הַכַּשְׂדִּ֛ים <S%H3778><s%> the Chaldeans לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אֲרָמִ֑ית <S%H762><s%> in Syriack מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> O king לְעָלְמִ֣ין <S%H5957><s%> for ever חֱיִ֔י <S%H2418><s%> live אֱמַ֥ר <S%H560><s%> tell חֶלְמָ֛א <S%H2493><s%> the dream [לְעַבְדַּיִךְ כ] (לְעַבְדָ֖ךְ <S%H5649><s%> servant ק) וּפִשְׁרָ֥א <S%H6591><s%> the interpretation נְחַוֵּֽא׃ <S%H2324><s%> and we will shew

עָנֵ֤ה <S%H6032><s%> answered מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> The king וְאָמַ֣ר <S%H560><s%> and said [לְכַשְׂדָּיֵא כ] (לְכַשְׂדָּאֵ֔י <S%H3779><s%> Chaldean ק) מִלְּתָ֖א <S%H4406><s%> The thing מִנִּ֣י <S%H4481><s%> from me אַזְדָּ֑א <S%H230><s%> is gone הֵ֣ן <S%H2006><s%> if לָ֤א <S%H3809><s%> ye will not תְהֽוֹדְעוּנַּ֙נִי֙ <S%H3046><s%> make known חֶלְמָ֣א <S%H2493><s%> unto me the dream וּפִשְׁרֵ֔הּ <S%H6591><s%> with the interpretation הַדָּמִין֙ <S%H1917><s%> in pieces תִּתְעַבְד֔וּן <S%H5648><s%> thereof ye shall be cut וּבָתֵּיכ֖וֹן <S%H1005><s%> and your houses נְוָלִ֥י <S%H5122><s%> a dunghill יִתְּשָׂמֽוּן׃ <S%H7761><s%> shall be made

וְהֵ֨ן <S%H2006><s%> But if חֶלְמָ֤א <S%H2493><s%> the dream וּפִשְׁרֵהּ֙ <S%H6591><s%> and the interpretation תְּֽהַחֲוֹ֔ן <S%H2324><s%> ye shew מַתְּנָ֤ן <S%H4978><s%> gifts וּנְבִזְבָּה֙ <S%H5023><s%> and rewards וִיקָ֣ר <S%H3367><s%> honour שַׂגִּ֔יא <S%H7690><s%> and great תְּקַבְּל֖וּן <S%H6902><s%> thereof ye shall receive מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> of קֳדָמָ֑י <S%H6925><s%> me לָהֵ֕ן <S%H2006><s%> if חֶלְמָ֥א <S%H2493><s%> me the dream וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <S%H6591><s%> and the interpretation הַחֲוֹֽנִי׃ <S%H2324><s%> shew

עֲנ֥וֹ <S%H6032><s%> They answered תִנְיָנ֖וּת <S%H8579><s%> again וְאָמְרִ֑ין <S%H560><s%> and said מַלְכָּ֕א <S%H4430><s%> Let the king חֶלְמָ֛א <S%H2493><s%> the dream יֵאמַ֥ר <S%H560><s%> tell לְעַבְד֖וֹהִי <S%H5649><s%> his servants וּפִשְׁרָ֥ה <S%H6591><s%> the interpretation נְהַחֲוֵֽה׃ <S%H2324><s%> and we will shew

עָנֵ֤ה <S%H6032><s%> answered מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> The king וְאָמַ֔ר <S%H560><s%> and said מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> of יַצִּיב֙ <S%H3330><s%> certainty יָדַ֣ע <S%H3046><s%> know אֲנָ֔ה <S%H576><s%> I דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> for עִדָּנָ֖א <S%H5732><s%> the time אַנְתּ֣וּן <S%H608><s%> that ye זָבְנִ֑ין <S%H2084><s%> would gain כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all קֳבֵל֙ <S%H6903><s%> according to דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch חֲזֵית֔וֹן <S%H2370><s%> ye see דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch אַזְדָּ֖א <S%H230><s%> is gone מִנִּ֥י <S%H4481><s%> from מִלְּתָֽא׃ <S%H4406><s%> the thing

דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> that הֵן־ <S%H2006><s%> But if חֶלְמָא֩ <S%H2493><s%> unto me the dream לָ֨א <S%H3809><s%> ye will not תְהֽוֹדְעֻנַּ֜נִי <S%H3046><s%> make known חֲדָה־ <S%H2298><s%> one הִ֣יא <S%H1932><s%> it דָֽתְכ֗וֹן <S%H1882><s%> decree וּמִלָּ֨ה <S%H4406><s%> words כִדְבָ֤ה <S%H3538><s%> lying וּשְׁחִיתָה֙ <S%H7844><s%> and corrupt [הַזְמִנְתּוּן כ] (הִזְדְּמִנְתּוּן֙ <S%H2164><s%> prepare ק) לְמֵאמַ֣ר <S%H560><s%> to speak קָֽדָמַ֔י <S%H6925><s%> before עַ֛ד <S%H5705><s%> me till דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch עִדָּנָ֖א <S%H5732><s%> the time יִשְׁתַּנֵּ֑א <S%H8133><s%> be changed לָהֵ֗ן <S%H2006><s%> if חֶלְמָא֙ <S%H2493><s%> me the dream אֱמַ֣רוּ <S%H560><s%> tell לִ֔י וְֽאִנְדַּ֕ע <S%H3046><s%> and I shall know דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> its פִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <S%H6591><s%> me the interpretation תְּהַחֲוֻנַּֽנִי׃ <S%H2324><s%> ye can shew

עֲנ֨וֹ <S%H6032><s%> answered [כַשְׂדָּיֵא כ] (כַשְׂדָּאֵ֤י <S%H3779><s%> the Chaldeans ק) קֳדָם־ <S%H6925><s%> before מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> the king וְאָ֣מְרִ֔ין <S%H560><s%> and said לָֽא־ <S%H3809><s%> not אִיתַ֤י <S%H383><s%> There is אֲנָשׁ֙ <S%H606><s%> a man עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon יַבֶּשְׁתָּ֔א <S%H3007><s%> the earth דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> who מִלַּ֣ת <S%H4406><s%> matter מַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> the king's יוּכַ֖ל <S%H3202><s%> that can לְהַחֲוָיָ֑ה <S%H2324><s%> shew כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> at any קֳבֵ֗ל <S%H6903><s%> according to דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> who כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> of any מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4430><s%> king רַ֣ב <S%H7229><s%> lord וְשַׁלִּ֔יט <S%H7990><s%> nor ruler מִלָּ֤ה <S%H4406><s%> things כִדְנָה֙ <S%H1836><s%> such לָ֣א <S%H3809><s%> [there is] no שְׁאֵ֔ל <S%H7593><s%> [that] asked לְכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> of any חַרְטֹּ֖ם <S%H2749><s%> magician וְאָשַׁ֥ף <S%H826><s%> or astrologer וְכַשְׂדָּֽי׃ <S%H3779><s%> The Chaldeans

וּמִלְּתָ֨א <S%H4406><s%> thing דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> which מַלְכָּ֤ה <S%H4430><s%> that the king שָׁאֵל֙ <S%H7593><s%> requireth יַקִּירָ֔ה <S%H3358><s%> And [it is] a rare וְאָחֳרָן֙ <S%H321><s%> other לָ֣א <S%H3809><s%> none אִיתַ֔י <S%H383><s%> and there is דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> who יְחַוִּנַּ֖הּ <S%H2324><s%> that can shew קֳדָ֣ם <S%H6925><s%> it before מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> the king לָהֵ֣ן <S%H3861><s%> except אֱלָהִ֔ין <S%H426><s%> the gods דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> whose מְדָ֣רְה֔וֹן <S%H4070><s%> whose dwelling עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> with בִּשְׂרָ֖א <S%H1321><s%> flesh לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> not אִיתֽוֹהִי׃ <S%H383><s%> is

כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> cause קֳבֵ֣ל <S%H6903><s%> For דְּנָ֔ה <S%H1836><s%> this מַלְכָּ֕א <S%H4430><s%> the king בְּנַ֖ס <S%H1149><s%> was angry וּקְצַ֣ף <S%H7108><s%> furious שַׂגִּ֑יא <S%H7690><s%> and very וַאֲמַר֙ <S%H560><s%> and commanded לְה֣וֹבָדָ֔ה <S%H7><s%> to destroy לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> all חַכִּימֵ֥י <S%H2445><s%> the wise בָבֶֽל׃ <S%H895><s%> [men] of Babylon

וְדָתָ֣א <S%H1882><s%> And the decree נֶפְקַ֔ת <S%H5312><s%> went forth וְחַכִּֽימַיָּ֖א <S%H2445><s%> that the wise מִֽתְקַטְּלִ֑ין <S%H6992><s%> [men] should be slain וּבְע֛וֹ <S%H1156><s%> and they sought דָּנִיֵּ֥אל <S%H1841><s%> Daniel וְחַבְר֖וֹהִי <S%H2269><s%> and his fellows לְהִתְקְטָלָֽה׃ <S%H6992><s%> to be slain פ

בֵּאדַ֣יִן <S%H116><s%> Then דָּנִיֵּ֗אל <S%H1841><s%> Daniel הֲתִיב֙ <S%H8421><s%> answered עֵטָ֣א <S%H5843><s%> with counsel וּטְעֵ֔ם <S%H2942><s%> and wisdom לְאַרְי֕וֹךְ <S%H746><s%> to Arioch רַב־ <S%H7229><s%> the captain טַבָּחַיָּ֖א <S%H2877><s%> guard דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> of מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> the king's דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> who נְפַ֣ק <S%H5312><s%> which was gone forth לְקַטָּלָ֔ה <S%H6992><s%> to slay לְחַכִּימֵ֖י <S%H2445><s%> the wise בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H895><s%> [men] of Babylon

עָנֵ֣ה <S%H6032><s%> He answered וְאָמַ֗ר <S%H560><s%> and said לְאַרְיוֹךְ֙ <S%H746><s%> to Arioch שַׁלִּיטָ֣א <S%H7990><s%> captain דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch מַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> the king's עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> For מָ֥ה <S%H4101><s%> what דָתָ֛א <S%H1882><s%> [is] the decree מְהַחְצְפָ֖ה <S%H2685><s%> [so] hasty מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> according קֳדָ֣ם <S%H6925><s%> from מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> the king אֱדַ֣יִן <S%H116><s%> Then מִלְּתָ֔א <S%H4406><s%> made the thing הוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3046><s%> known אַרְי֖וֹךְ <S%H746><s%> Arioch לְדָנִיֵּֽאל׃ <S%H1841><s%> to Daniel

וְדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1841><s%> Then Daniel עַ֖ל <S%H5954><s%> went in וּבְעָ֣ה <S%H1156><s%> and desired מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> of מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> the king דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch זְמָ֣ן <S%H2166><s%> him time יִנְתֵּן־ <S%H5415><s%> that he would give לֵ֔הּ וּפִשְׁרָ֖א <S%H6591><s%> the interpretation לְהַֽחֲוָיָ֥ה <S%H2324><s%> and that he would shew לְמַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king פ

אֱדַ֥יִן <S%H116><s%> Then דָּֽנִיֵּ֖אל <S%H1841><s%> Daniel לְבַיְתֵ֣הּ <S%H1005><s%> to his house אֲזַ֑ל <S%H236><s%> went וְ֠לַחֲנַנְיָה <S%H2608><s%> to Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֧ל <S%H4333><s%> Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָ֛ה <S%H5839><s%> and Azariah חַבְר֖וֹהִי <S%H2269><s%> his companions מִלְּתָ֥א <S%H4406><s%> and made the thing הוֹדַֽע׃ <S%H3046><s%> known

וְרַחֲמִ֗ין <S%H7359><s%> mercies לְמִבְעֵא֙ <S%H1156><s%> That they would desire מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> according קֳדָם֙ <S%H6925><s%> from אֱלָ֣הּ <S%H426><s%> the God שְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> concerning רָזָ֖ה <S%H7328><s%> secret דְּנָ֑ה <S%H1836><s%> this דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> so לָ֤א <S%H3809><s%> should not יְהֹֽבְדוּן֙ <S%H7><s%> perish דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1841><s%> that Daniel וְחַבְר֔וֹהִי <S%H2269><s%> and his fellows עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> with שְׁאָ֖ר <S%H7606><s%> the rest חַכִּימֵ֥י <S%H2445><s%> of the wise בָבֶֽל׃ <S%H895><s%> [men] of Babylon
